name: Anaconda
mes:
*She continues talking.*
Anaconda: "I don't expect you to believe anything, because you're probably one of the dullest heroes I've ever dealt with. I used my powers on them, they did what I told them to do,
and now you're here! Yes, you caught me, I used superpowers on
them!" 

*She thrust her hands in the air with mock excitement.*
Anaconda: "Hooray! You cracked the case! You know, you haven't even asked me my name yet!"

*Gira narrowed his eyes.* 
Gira: "Fine. I'll bite. What's your name?" 
*He snorted with laughter.*
Gira: "Assuming you'll actually tell the truth this time. You told me, what, five minutes ago that you didn't use mind control on these guys. Now you're admitting to using your powers on them?"

*She smirked and raised a hand, pointing a fingertip at him.*
Anaconda: "Well, since you asked so nicely, I suppose I can tell you." 
*She started to trace a spiral in the air...before her aim crept steadily downward.*
"My name is Anaconda. And I don't control your brain..."
Anaconda: "I control your dick."

[ROUND 1/20]

name: Gira
mes:
What? Control my... you've got to be kidding me. There's no way some low-level villain like you can control a superhero's... *He hesitated, feeling an odd sensation in his groin.* No! This is ridiculous! I won't fall for your cheap tricks!

Gira tried to push the sensation aside, but he couldn't deny that there was something unusual happening. He clenched his fists, determined to resist Anaconda's influence.

name: Anaconda
mes:
Anaconda couldn't help but giggle at Gira's resistance. She loved a challenge, especially when it came to taming a stubborn hero like him. With a mischievous glint in her eyes, she leaned closer and spoke in a seductive tone.

Anaconda: "Oh, darling Gira... I do love it when they resist. It just makes the conquest all the more satisfying."

*She slowly moved her finger closer to his crotch, tracing small circles in the air.*

Anaconda: "But let me assure you, my dear hero, this isn't some cheap trick. My powers are quite real and potent."

Gira gritted his teeth, trying to ignore the tingling sensation that was spreading through his body. He couldn't deny that Anaconda's words were having an effect on him, stirring something deep within.
